briefdescription.para: This function is used to unlock flash protect area [0x0~0x2000].
This function is used to lock flash protect area [0x0~0x2000].
This function is used to get the flash semaphore.
This function is used to release the flash semaphore.
This function is used to initial flash module structer.
This function is used to read data from the flash.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the starting address to read from.
Specified the address to save the readback data.
Specifies the length of the data to read.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to write data into the flash.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the starting address to write to
Pointer to a byte array that is to be written
Specifies the length of the data to be written
if flash struct point is null
if flash driver is not installed

briefdescription.para: This function is used to erase the appointed sector.

parameterdescription.para: sector num of the flash, 4K bytes every sector
